Posts.Content: Had breast lump removed in November 2013. then 2nd op for Axillery clearance. just getting arm back to normal but have some cording. waiting to see physio to sort that out. starting chemo next friday FEC and T. had a ultra sound scan today on neck.  As check up this morning the consultant felt swelling of lymph nodes in neck.  had a cat scan few days ago. macmillan nurse phoned me later today. to tell me need to have MRI scan tomorrow. as Cat scan showed something on my spine. also the Ultra sound scan showed something. told me not to worry as it could be an old injury or start of something degenerative. well I am worrying. any one else had this.
Posts.Title: more waiting. more tests.

Posts.Content: I am new to the group. diagnosed in October. tumour removed november and test on lymphs. 2 weeks later was told need another op to remove lymph nodes. not told how many. or maybe was and did not take it all in. I am having op on the 18th Dec. 4 days time. so will know more then. been told the tumour was aggresive. will start chemo and also told radiotheraphy in the new year. feeling nervous and worried. but suppose its normal to feel like I do. I am lucky I have supportive family. last op I had they had to keep me in recovery for some time as my blood pressure hit the roof. I am now on the clexane injections as I was on warfarin for a Brain tumour I had 12 years ago. I am all clear with that. but got to stay on warfarin for life.
Posts.Title: axillery clearance

Posts.Content: Tthank you.  made it clearer for me now. just feeling bit low. just few days to go. my arm is just getting better after last op. I am an active person and being laid up gets to me. but need to get on with it and hopefully it does stop the beggers. lol
Posts.Title: axillery clearance
